description:
Huggle 3 is an anti-vandalism tool for use on Wikipedia and other MediaWiki sites.


Downloads
Windows:
Both packages are built using Visual Studio and require Administrator rights for installation, because they install vcredist packages (Visual Studio C++ redistributable package, containing libraries needed when running software compiled in Visual Studio).
- 32 bit: Built using VS 2017 / Qt 5.12.12 (Qt 6 doesn't support 32 bits anymore)
- 64 bit: Built using VS 2019 / Qt 6.6.3
Linux:
It's recommended to compile Huggle yourself. There are also snapcraft packages, that may however be outdated.
MacOS:
We provide packages for Intel x86_64 and ARM (Apple Silicon).
- ARM: built on Sonoma 14.4 using Qt 6.7.2
- Intel: built on Monterey 12.6.3 using Qt 5.12.0
